website_summaries.verdict: Great all-day, go-everywhere athletic shoes for people with problem feet. Some color variants look downright stylish.
pros: Good for people with foot, knee, and back problems
Comes in a variety of colors
Lace-up front with padded tongue and collar
cons: Soles are not as flexible as most athletic shoes

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous all-day kind of shoe
customer_reviews.text: Even though I had to order/return to finally get the size that fit correctly, it was worth every bit of time that I spent on this project. The shoe is fabulous. It is one of those very rare shoes that I could put on out of the box & wear all day with total comfort. Yes, the shoe is expensive, but, believe me, it is worth the price. The materials are good quality, it is well made, style is cute but the bottom line is, if you are looking for comfort, this is the shoe for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Jones

customer_reviews.title: Did not like the sole
customer_reviews.text: There was a lot to appreciate with this shoe, the Mephisto Women's Laser Walking Shoe. The leather and construction was excellent. The shoe has simple, clean lines with the flexibility of dark colored laces to better fit your foot. The dark metallic gray leather is trendy but still a neutral. My issue was with the "Laser" sole. The product description states the sole is rubber. In my experience usually rubber soles are quiet. However, I found walking around my house the sole was both noisy and too stiff. Perhaps a different insole/orthotic could help but at this price point I did not want to buy a new insole.
customer_reviews.author: 5700feet

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this pair
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of Mephisto shoes years ago and still wear it for traveling. Those airbag soles offered really good foot support. The only problem was that it didn't look "dressy" enough for work (shoelaces and suede). I then went to Timberland Pro which I loved but evidently those shoes have been discontinued. Now in search of a replacement for my Timberland shoes and then I remembered Mephisto. I searched and found this shoe (yes, it has shoelaces but it's not suede.) I wore this pair on a 9-hour shift and had no problems with my feet hurting or anything. A real plus!
customer_reviews.author: rocketdog333

customer_reviews.title: Feels good on your foot
customer_reviews.text: The color of this shoe is called Warm Grey. It's as shown on the screen--more of a light khaki. Fits well. The tongue is just a wee bit high for me, but I'm counting on that not being an issue. Feels good on your foot. Good insole is really comfy and it's removable if you need to use an orthotic. usually replace the insole on any shoe I buy. I won't be doing that for this oxford!
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a narrow foot and a falling arch. Wanted a casual 'sneaker' like shoe without a big brand name billboard splattered across it. These were narrow and fitted the heel & the middle of the foot but the narrow toe box is what killed it for me. The toe box was way too long and narrow. Feels like I'm wearing clown shoes. The support is not as expected at all. I can't wear these for extended periods, not enough arch support and the sides give too much slack. My feet don't breathe well in these shoes either. I can get more support out of a FitFlop brand than these...
customer_reviews.author: MJW45

customer_reviews.title: In love with shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Don't want to take them off. I have permanent stress fractures from old sports injury which means I need great shoes. Bought with no prior knowledge of brand, took a chance and they are fab. Standing for me is not fun at the best of times and with a 12.5kg 16 month old on my arm it is tough but I can do it all much longer. If I currently had the money, I would be ordering a second pair. Great comfort, support, fits orthodox well and light and looks good. What more to ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great Walking Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great Walking Shoe! I took these shoes right out of the box, and took a long 3 hour walk. These shoes are amazing!! Usually, after long walks, I have tender feet and sore knees. But not these Mephisto Laser styled shoes. The Soft Air Technology, or Air Jet System, really made a difference in the comfort and support of my feet. My 6.5 size was true to form, and the width was perfect. Also, this shoe gives great arch support. This is my first pair of Mephisto shoes, and I will be ordering more styles in the future. These are by far better than any athletic, walking sneakers I have purchased. These shoes are a must for the serious walker!
customer_reviews.author: Traveler.

customer_reviews.title: Grateful for Mephisto combination of amazing comfort , sturdiness and style
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is that these shoes have totally lived up to the well-deserved reputation of Mephisto .The day after they arrived, I put them on, took a long trek carrying heavy groceries and felt as though I were walking on air. And they are SO stylish (which is not obvious in the image shown). this senior citizen is very very happy and grateful.
customer_reviews.author: SarahRM

customer_reviews.title: I bought these as they were recommended by a podiatrist
customer_reviews.text: I bought these as they were recommended by a podiatrist. In my opinion they aren't worth the 200.00 I spent on them. They run narrow which is fine for me because my foot is a little narrow. I think they would be terribly uncomfortable with an average width foot. Also, they have very little cushion at the toe portion of the shoe and they do not absorb shock well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Mephisto shoe exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: My experience with Mephisto shoes has been fabulous, and this shoe proved no exception. They fit perfectly and are extremely comfortable, not to mention beautiful. Since I have developed knee problems, I have to be sure that all my shoes have good shock absorbency, so that was the big unknown. I shouldn't have doubted. This shoe is perfect, and it even has some arch support, which I hadn't expected.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy Scalzo

customer_reviews.title: Finally, the shoes I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoes and very comfortable. I had to order half size bigger since I have bunions and I also have my orthotics that I can fit in. I have tried a lot of sneakers for years and somehow could not get the right one. This is perfect and I may just order another color !!
customer_reviews.author: Nims

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable shoes I've ever worn
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable I bought a second pair. I have a lot of problems with my feet and have problems finding shoes that fit. These shoes are great.
customer_reviews.author: A.A.A. Fair

customer_reviews.title: Your feet will thank you.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a trip to Ireland and have been wearing to check them out. So comfortable I forget I have them on! Wish they came in fun colors.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoe.
customer_reviews.text: Well constructed and comfortable. Waterproof the suede before using. Needed a small size not available at most stores. Wanted to try before I bought. Paid full price at Nordstrom's on my first pair (they earned it). Came home, checked the price at Amazon, and bought a second pair with a nice savings!
customer_reviews.author: DM-C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing shoes.. I bought three pairs in different colors about 6 months ago. And the "dressier" one with patent leather works even for...work! In truth - these shoes fit well, inspire me to walk more, and are particularly easy to lace and tighten. So just last week I noted that you had only two pairs left in my size in black. Bought both of them. Sometimes a manufacturer (even Mephisto) will pull a design out of their offerings. So now I rotate their use. Yippee!! Sidelina
customer_reviews.author: Deli-kins

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: I am a dog walker, I need good walking shoes. These shoes are so comfortable for walking, even in Europe on the cobblestone streets
customer_reviews.author: caroline

customer_reviews.title: Black Swans
customer_reviews.text: Graceful and elegant , beautifully made . I think they'll be perfect to take on a trip when I want to keep up appearances , but be comfortable at the same time . I haven't worn them outside yet, but they do fit well. I had to return the 7's, because they were too small . I would recommend that you order up 1/2 size . I can't wait for the snow to melt in New England so I can go for a walk in them !
customer_reviews.author: pink flour girl

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run a little narrow, so they fit me just right. I like them, but find them a little stiff. The soles are not as flexible as other athletic shoes I've bought. I love the color.
customer_reviews.author: GmaM

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. Lots of support. Comfortable walking all day. Second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa C

customer_reviews.title: Suede mephisto
customer_reviews.text: These are super comfortable! Wanted something besides tennis shoes and that look nicer but mainly wanted comfort. I have had Mephisto sandals in the past, these are first pair of closed toe shoes. They are also warmer than any of my tennis shoes. I did order 1/2 size larger, just to see as I am older and I think I read a review that said got a little bit larger size. Overall happy with these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Toes have room!
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a pair of shoes with a high toe box. These fit the bill. I wore these walking all over Spain for a month. I purchased a pair in black last year and they kept my toes happy in Italy and France. Good arch support-very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto
customer_reviews.text: I just love this shoe - Mephisto is the most comfortable shoe ever, especially for those of us with problem feet. The blue and white Laser Lace-up is really cute without looking too 'preppy' or too much like a running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Some days I need to stand and walk for long hours. My feet do not hurt after long days when wearing these shoes which is a major improvement from my previous shoes. My main issue with these is that they are a bit wide for my feet. In the end, I would rather not be in pain wearing shoes with the laces pulled as tight as possible rather than have pain with correct width shoes.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. Booth

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them to wear on vacation. Several people said they ran small, so I ordered a half size larger. I had to return the large ones and order my normal size. I didn't wear them on the trip because it rained EVERY day. Too expensive to ruin right off the bat. They are great for those with heel issues. I wish they had a little more padding for the ball of the foot.
customer_reviews.author: mimi3

customer_reviews.title: These run small by half a size
customer_reviews.text: My wife liked the look but unfortunately they were slightly small. I had no problems returning them, but was not pleased that when I wanted to get the right size, they jacked the price up by almost 25% thereby making the local store a better option as to immediate satisfaction both in time and price. One needs to do a little research prior to ordering online now a days.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. R

customer_reviews.title: Ok with orthotics.
customer_reviews.text: The shoe itself is as pictured, but overall it's a little heavy. The orthotics fit in it fine, which is good, because it doesn't have great arch support. Like any shoe, make sure to break 'em in before traveling, as they will cause blisters.
customer_reviews.author: MCV

customer_reviews.title: The old version of this shoe was my favorite ever -- I bought 3-4 pairs over the course ...
customer_reviews.text: The old version of this shoe was my favorite ever -- I bought 3-4 pairs over the course of 4 years. This new shoe isn't quite as high quality as the old version, but it is still my favorite pair of shoes and I'm sure that I'll be a returning customer.
customer_reviews.author: Jo E.

customer_reviews.title: Love This Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I hadn't even heard of Mephisto, but my husband had. It looking for a pair of black patent these shoes came up. I am having a knee replacement and I wanted some comfortable but nice looking shoes. The reviews on these shoes were excellent so I thought I would try them. They are everything I could have hoped for, comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: JA NY Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Walker
customer_reviews.text: who needs good shoes and likes to be a bit stylish,I am so pleased. Treat your feet is my motto.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Great support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these shoes. They fit perfectly and provide great support.
customer_reviews.author: Cate

customer_reviews.title: Great deal on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to find navy walking shoes, so I bought these Mephistos half a year ago. I thought I should get a second pair because they are great shoes -- comfortable, good arch support, great travel shoes. The price on Amazon was so much cheaper I bought a second pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Good shoes for everything.
customer_reviews.text: Mephisto Laser shoes are about the best that you can get. They outperform almsot every other brand for me. The laser is lighter than their traditional Mephsito shoes and alsd more sport. The Laser Perfore are also good -very similar
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L. Stein

customer_reviews.title: So far and that has only been a few days they are fine.
customer_reviews.text: Hoping they will allow me to walk my walk each day without having foot problems. So far and that has only been a few days they are fine.
customer_reviews.author: L Daughtridge

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe for walking and standing
customer_reviews.text: A fine shoe for walking and stability and looks tailored not clumsy.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Madame

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: I immediately wore these shoes and walk about 5-6 miles daily in the city! These help my knee problem and are very comfy! I usually wear size 9.5 and these fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: MartyB

customer_reviews.title: most comfortable walking shoe ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of the Mephisto Laser walking shoes. I gave up on sneakers...., they pinch my toes and have never been comfortable; now these are what I wear to walk and walk and walk! Great shoe and support......, hope they keep these in their line forever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Gallogly

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is obviously very well made, which is why I give it 4 stars. However, I prefer a shoe with a contoured footbed that accommodates a heel set down into a heel cup...This shoe elevates my heel a bit more than I prefer. I decided not to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Gringa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Not enough support. Thin leather. Will be returning. I could tell these shoes had been worn. I have several mephisto laceups that I love.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort Worth Having
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, they are great right out of the box. Bought to handle lots of walking in San Francisco and surrounding nature walks, they held up and were quite comfortable. I hope they hold up over time but we'll have to wait and see.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Great support
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe. Its the second time I have bought this shoe.. I walk all over NYC with these shoes!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Kerr

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this shoe - super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I take a size 9 and bought 1/2 size up and the fit is perfection. These shoes are amazingly comfortable and I recommend them highly. Easily to lace up and go! Perfect for walking long distances.
customer_reviews.author: just curious

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely comfortable and great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes could possibly be a half size larger. They are extremely comfortable and great walking shoes.
customer_reviews.author: nance

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoe so far ...
customer_reviews.text: ... But still fits like a dream with right thickness socks (for winter months mostly anyway). Love the combo of patent and smooth-soft leathers! Expect this shoe to last (I also have a pair of black nubuck Laser Mephisto's acquired from Zappos).
customer_reviews.author: Mary Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is a little hard, not as comfortable as I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: JAN D

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The only shoes my elderly mother can wear all day! Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Kitterman

customer_reviews.title: I love my Mephistos!!
customer_reviews.text: These Laser Mepphistos are wonderful! They fit me perfectly and feel light yet comfortably sturdy! Thank you for my first pair of Mephisto walking shoes. I've worn the Mephisto Helen Sandals for thre past 20 years. They are attractive, supportive and last for many years!
customer_reviews.author: Luminis

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a perfect fit and I often have problems with fit. Very comfortable, somewhat "old folks" looking but not nearly as bad as some Walking Shoes. Overall I am quite happy with this purchase and I have a new favorite brand of shoe. Mephisto's are worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: L. Ball

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Laser Perf shoes Rock!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are a Godsend! I noticed an improvement in my back after just one day.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou

customer_reviews.title: Have 6 pair!
customer_reviews.text: This style is easy to put on and very comfortable to wear for the entire day- no matter if I'm walking or driving. Great comfort that does not look orthopedic!
customer_reviews.author: Suwink

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy but expensive
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive but VERY nice shoes. The most comfy pair of shoes I own
customer_reviews.author: Michael Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Comfort for a month
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this shoe for work and I did but it lasted for a month and a half. I do a lot of standing for about 40 hours a week. I had to use my custom fit insoles to wear these shoes longer and get my money's worth. My quest for comfy shoes continues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Give them a try
customer_reviews.text: These are expensive but well worth it. I wear a 10 and have a wide foot so I order the size 11 and they are just fine. They are a little dressier than your reg.tennis shoe which I like. They are very comfortable and makes the perfect walking shoe!! This is my 2nd pair and I will buy the white when it comes back in stock.
customer_reviews.author: mary therese

customer_reviews.title: Most Comfortable Shoe!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are the most comfortable pair of shoes I own. I just love them! I wear them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Zapecza

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of these shoes.There are very comfortable at the beginning. If you are between sizes, order one half size down.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Stewart

customer_reviews.title: comfortable shoe
customer_reviews.text: They are nice comfortable casual shoes, good for walking. I have diabetes and they do not constrict my feet. Stylish too.
customer_reviews.author: GreenEyedMom

customer_reviews.title: ... had them refunded smoothly re-bought the new size and love them immensely
customer_reviews.text: Bought these shoes in the wrong size had them refunded smoothly re-bought the new size and love them immensely.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel Bachrach

customer_reviews.title: good casual shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is a good shoe for someone with a fairly narrow heal. I wear orthotics and it is roomy enough for them. With orthotics, it has great arch support. So far, there is very little trouble breaking it in.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are great. They are a good fit and wear well ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great. They are a good fit and wear well and look good
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Fuller

customer_reviews.title: rk
customer_reviews.text: The shoe fit well and was attractive. However, it was not firm enough for me and I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: it was a gift - and the person loved it!
customer_reviews.author: matilda

customer_reviews.title: Great walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: My wife walls a lot, and absolutely loved these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Joe Mack

customer_reviews.title: Linda
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were too narrow thru the toes, Love Mephisto but these are not the same shoe they use to make
customer_reviews.author: Linda A Barle

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto quality ... can't be beat!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful fitting, amazingly supportive, good looking shoes. Couldn't be happier. They look like they feel ... very high quality!Mephisto
customer_reviews.author: Damian Thompson

customer_reviews.title: ... these for a European trip and they were a perfect fit and comfortable from the first day I wore ...
customer_reviews.text: I used these for a European trip and they were a perfect fit and comfortable from the first day I wore them. Joan G
customer_reviews.author: Joan G.

customer_reviews.title: VERY comfortable and look nice with pants
customer_reviews.text: Have ordered this shoe for years. VERY comfortable and look nice with pants. Hope they never discontinue this model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customecr

customer_reviews.title: wonderful walking shoe
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the Mephisto walking shoe. It's comfortable and surprisingly nice looking as opposed to a sneaker. I received my order very quickly and in perfect condition.
customer_reviews.author: B. Reinish

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoe but runs small
customer_reviews.text: Great Shoe but runs small. I am a true size 10 and this shoe is a bit small. I would order more in assorted colors in a 1/2 size larger if I could get a better price. Very expensive shoe
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Picone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome comfortable walking shoes
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even need a break in period!! Awesome comfortable walking shoes!! And they look nice too so I wear them at work!!
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish for an orthotice friendly sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so comfortable and stylish. True to size, I normally wear a size 8 shoe and that is the size I ordered. This is my third pair of Mephisto shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Pam Cotter

customer_reviews.title: I love Mephisto shoes you can take them out of the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Mephisto shoes you can take them out of the box and wear them straight away and they are so comfortable. An excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing similar Mephistos for years and love them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable shoes I have ever owned. This is my second pair. They are true to size, which is an issue I have had with other brands...and the price was right, too!
customer_reviews.author: Nicsnan

customer_reviews.title: Mephisto Lace-Up
customer_reviews.text: I have this shoe in another color so I knew it would work. I love the fit. They are the best lace up shoe I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Susan M. Sheraga

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Somewhat expensive for sneakers, but fit and look great. Wearable all day.
customer_reviews.author: SteveStockwell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit nicely; as good as I expect Mephisto to be. Like walking on air.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Fox

customer_reviews.title: Returning product
customer_reviews.text: I have to return it; It was too small and too structured for my tender feet, very uncomfortable but attractive
customer_reviews.author: kay goss

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable walking shoe. They fit me well, but I do have wider feet. I already have a pair in red and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Amy W.

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: I am on my feet all day for work. I've tried so many shoes that still left my feet tired and sore. These shoes are stylish and sooo comfortable all day, everyday. I like that the insole or outer sole can be replaced when worn out. Thinking of getting another pair in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Tardiff

customer_reviews.title: ... in these shoes and can't say enough about how wonderful they are for my feet
customer_reviews.text: I have walked all over Canada and Alaska in these shoes and can't say enough about how wonderful they are for my feet .I did know my Mephisto size from my first pair which I purchased from a shoe department in a retail store.Happy feet Happy Lady!! M.H.
customer_reviews.author: M H

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: For the price these shoes were not worth it to me. They were not comfortable at all, and I needed something comfortable to deal with my Plantar fasciitis.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried to find these shoes online for several years. My old pair were the best walking shoes I'd ever bought, but I kept buying others hoping to find a comfortable substitute. These Mephistos are as wonderful for my ancient surgery damaged feet as my worn ones were before my feet were so misshapen. Very good, and good looking. I'd recommend to anyone who likes comfort!
customer_reviews.author: V. Levy

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, but not good for me. Too narrow and leather was harder on the inside than I expected it to be. Trying the Clarks
customer_reviews.author: Darlene H

customer_reviews.title: the shoes offer really good support. however
customer_reviews.text: the shoes offer really good support. however, one shoe has given me a horrible blister. I am looking for a lift now to see if that helps.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mcnally

product_meta.title: Mephisto Women's Laser Walking Shoe
product_meta.description:
Walking shoe with mephisto soft air technology.SIZING: Both feet should be measured, as most people have one foot which is larger than the other. It’s also a good idea to measure your feet at the end of the day as they are usually slightly larger at that time

Don't stress yourself! (At least while you're walking anyway.) The leather Laser lace-up from Mephisto is designed for simple, no-nonsense comfort and support, perfect for power commuting, dog walking and errand running. A removable insole adds extra cushioning and shock absorbtion, while the thick rubber bottom lends reliable traction even on slippery surfaces.

Mephisto makes some of the finest walking shoes on earth. Their comfort, support and durability are recognized wherever people are serious about walking. For more than three decades, Mephisto has been on the forefront of walking-shoe innovation. Mephisto’s natural products are handmade of leather, latex, cork and rubber.

See more
